title: ./all-nacl.bash does not compile
body:
by **devilgreen**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. cd $GOROOT/src
2. ./all.bash
3. ./all-nacl.bash

What is the expected output?
All NaCL packages built correctly.

What do you see instead?

8c -Inacl -I386 -Inacl/386 -wF   nacl/386/closure.c
nacl/386/closure.c:171 name not declared: mheap
nacl/386/closure.c:172 name not declared: mheap
nacl/386/closure.c:219 function args not checked: runtime.dyncode_copy
nacl/386/closure.c:221 name not declared: fd
nacl/386/closure.c:243 name not declared: finclosure

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
8g

Which operating system are you using?
Ubuntu 10.10 x64

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
44921c88724a tip

Please provide any additional information below.
